txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Matted furs from the beasts in Ered Luin. Collect them and deliver them to Dorri at Gondamon to earn favour with Thorin's Hall.
'Furs can be used from everything from boot liners to rugs. You can never have enough fur.\n\n'Your efforts will echo through the halls.'
'There are beasts all throughout these lands, too numerous to count really. We could use with more furs for our homes and boots.'
Dorri wants matted furs. Dorri can be found standing at the west gate of Gondamon.
Deliver the matted furs to Dorri at Gondamon
You have accepted a task to acquire matted furs. You are to deliver them to Dorri at the western gate of Gondamon to earn favour with Thorin's Hall.
Wanted: Matted furs from the beasts in Ered Luin.
